command.name: quote
command.description: retrive quote of current day's market info for securities in database and writes result to a serialized file.

option.name: debug
option.description: enables debug mode, displays the options and arguments passed

option.name: variable
option.description: enables variable mode, displays the value of all program variables

option.name: test
option.description: enables test mode, prints values to the screen without writing file to disk

option.name: tickers
option.description: comma seperated list of tickers to get quotes for, defaults to all tickers in database

option.name: needle_table
option.description: name of table that contains the securities, defaults to 'security'

option.name: historical
option.description: enables historical mode, gets historical quotes instead of current quotes

option.name: range
option.description: date range from which to get historical quotes, accepts dates in mmddyyyy format and recognizes the key words 'today', 'yesterday', and 'lastyear', defaults to 'lastyear:today'
